reviews.title: Very fun and addictive
reviews.comment: This is a great slot game, different bonus games to choose from, able to add boost to double you winnings or soon faster to rake in the exp, a progressive jackpot, a shop to buy items for fun, and you earn pocket change that is used to get real rewards.
reviews.author: Chris Brown

reviews.title: Nice but too easy
reviews.comment: This is a nice and well made slots game, but it\'s way too easy to win. I don\'t see why anyone would buy more credits or powerups when you can\'t help but make money by winning no matter what you do. Also, there\'s something wonky about how the PC are payed out.
reviews.author: Sami Ylinen

reviews.title: No rewards
reviews.comment: Was 5 stars until the update stopped giving me pocket change for my tasks. I\'m just wasting my time now.
reviews.author: JohnsonLJ8

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: Ever since the upgrade, this game outright sucks. Should\'ve never upgraded.
reviews.author: Brittanie Love

reviews.title: Rewards don\'t work
reviews.comment: The game is fine. I\'m not so keen on doing the little extra bits to get free coins, and never getting the rewards. Edit: now getting REALLY fed up with installing apps and starting them, or completing mammoth surveys for no rewards. There is no way I would pay for an upgrade if the free stuff doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Andy Stutt

reviews.title: I cannot lie
reviews.comment: I cannot lie. This game is great. I can get points from playing and redeem for gifts. Its great. Looking forward to see more:-)
reviews.author: Ali cia

reviews.title: Pocket Change rewards are amazing
reviews.comment: Fun slots game the gives over 25 PC daily simply by playing. Love it. Please never change!
reviews.author: Samuel Galvez

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Not really gambling type of guy but it kills time like no other. Wished there were more pC coins to get tho...
reviews.author: Absinth Mughelli

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: You can play for free (with ads) and earn real discounts ect. Fun!!
reviews.author: Ashley Moree

reviews.title: Fun game n
reviews.comment: Needs something more cant think if what but when i do so will you lol oh yea less ads slows game to much
reviews.author: chris mcswain

reviews.title: Fun n easy
reviews.comment: Gr8 way to waste time, easy to win and build a fortune. Random nudges, wth?? Multiple holds would get 5 stars and more coins on mini games please:-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
reviews.comment: Does not pay your coins when you do the down loads for free coins.
reviews.author: James Standridge

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Would u make screen smaller so we can c icons on iphone?

reviews.title: This game is fine
reviews.comment: I bought the + game and there is no diffrence, if i jad known that,  i would have bought your other slot machanie
reviews.author: Nora Harrison

reviews.title: I\'M LOVING THIS GAME!
reviews.comment: WHEN I HAVE SOME TIME TO KILL OR I\'M JUST BORED I START PLAYING IT. I ENJOY THE DIFFERENT ASPECTS INCLUDED. NOW IF I COULD JUST GET MY HANDS ON THAT HUNDRED THOU THAT IT SAYS I\'VE WON SO FAR...LOL HONEY I\'D TRULY BE A HAPPY CAMPER!
reviews.author: SHARON BUTLER

reviews.title: no problem
reviews.comment: good game for passing time
reviews.author: al alex

reviews.comment: Theres so many ads i cant even play. I go to push spin and before it rolls theres another ad to cut me off. Very annoying.\tMay delete. All ad and no game.
reviews.author: Rick Riales

reviews.title: Used to be Fun......but not now
reviews.comment: I used to have no problems with this game other than the normal annoying advertising but I guess that comes with a free game, now I guess since the last update I click on the application on my phone it will say \" application not installed\" ( I have checked in my applications on my phone and it is there) so in order for me to play I have to go to the app store and hit open to play ???? I have Samsung Galaxy Note2.
reviews.author: Birna Kristinsdottir

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Will recommend to friends and families
reviews.author: Javian Gonzalez

reviews.title: Easy play
reviews.comment: Very easy to play game but all of the \'extra\' stuff gets a little annoying after awhile
reviews.author: luna sears
